CustomField.formula: If(Not(ISBLANK(Demand__c)), Demand__r.Booking__r.Name, If(Not(ISBLANK(Receipt__c)), Receipt__r.Booking__r.Name, If(Not(ISBLANK(Transfer_Amount__c)), Transfer_Amount__r.Booking__r.Name, If(Not(ISBLANK(Registration_Payment_Account__c)), Registration_Payment_Account__r.Booking__r.Name, ''))))
CustomField.label: Booking No.
